name: To Sell The Stars
description:
This game was made for ProcJam!

Wander a procedural universe trying to settle and sell your planets! The music should be stream/YouTube safe.

Be careful: "too high" and "way too high" settings are legit too high and way too high. Consider running at lower resolutions, too. Not because they're faster, but because they look a little better.

The Mac/Linux builds are untested, but hopefully they work.

Developed almost entirely in-stream! Watch here:
